T02D2927:330a-1: a'arya badzra bi d'a ra na n'a ma dh'a ra ni ba lim bi dhi kra ma n'a ma /
T02D2927:330a-3: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya
T02D2927:330a-4: ba'i gzungs kyi gtor ma'i cho ga'i rim pa zhes
T02D2927:330a-5: bya ba / 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2927:330a-6: don rnams ma lus rab mdzad pa'i //
T02D2927:330a-8: rnal 'byor kun la phan bskyed pa'i //
T02D2927:330a-9: gtor ma'i cho ga mdor bsdus bshad //
T02D2927:330a-10: bar chad zhi dang tshogs bsags dang //
T02D2927:330a-11: 'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D2927:330a-12: zla ba zhag dang thun mtshams la //
T02D2927:330a-13: yo byad ci 'byor gtor ma gtang //
T02D2927:330a-14: gtor ma'i cho ga rgyas pa ni //
T02D2927:330a-15: blang byas g-yo yig gsum ltar byas //
T02D2927:330a-17: bdag byas cho gas kun la 'gro //
T02D2927:330a-18: de bas so so'i lha tshogs dang //
T02D2927:330a-19: zhi sogs gang 'dod lha tshogs bsgyur //
T02D2927:330a-20: mdun du mandal legs byas te //
T02D2927:330a-21: phyogs skyong bgegs la me tog dbul //
T02D2927:330a-22: rgyal la sogs pa de bzhin te //
T02D2927:330a-23: khri stengs rin chen snod gtsang ma //
T02D2927:330a-24: 'bras chan khur ba sha sogs pa'i //
T02D2927:330a-25: gtor ma gsum ma ma gcig dag ste //
T02D2927:330a-26: mchod yon mchod lnga bcas pa'o //
T02D2927:330a-27: sngags pa khrus byas gos gtsang gyon //
T02D2927:330a-28: yi dam lhar gnas bgegs bsal nas //
T02D2927:330a-29: yang snying gis sam yig gsum gyis //
T02D2927:330a-30: bdud rtsir byin rlabs nam mkha' mdzod //
T02D2927:330a-31: de yi sngags dang phyag rgya spel //
T02D2927:330a-32: de nas dgug byed phyag rgya dang //
T02D2927:330b-0: dza: zhes pa yis @330b phyogs skyong bgegs //
T02D2927:330b-1: bkra shis lha mo bcas te dgug / me tog stan la rab bzhag nas //
T02D2927:330b-2: yum gyi rgyas gdab dam tshig bstan //
T02D2927:330b-3: bsang gtor mchod yon mchod lnga dbul //
T02D2927:330b-4: de las lag g-yas snying gar gtad //
T02D2927:330b-5: g-yon pa rtse gsum gtor mar bstan //
T02D2927:330b-6: se gol brdab cing sngags 'dis dbul //
T02D2927:330b-7: aom badzra a'a:h'um aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a
T02D2927:330b-8: n'am a'a dya nutpanna tv'a ta da sha di ka
T02D2927:330b-9: lo ka p'a la dhrika / sarba bighn'am /
T02D2927:330b-10: mam ga la de w'i aashta sa pa ri b'a ra ba l'im p'u dza kh'a hi /
T02D2927:330b-11: ma ma sarba karmm'a s'a dha ya h'um h'um h'um /
T02D2927:330b-12: lan gsum brjod la gtor ma de //
T02D2927:330b-13: bdud rtsi 'dod yon lnga ldan par //
T02D2927:330b-14: rdo rje zhal du rang sngags kyis //
T02D2927:330b-15: drangs pas sbyin pa gnyis rdzogs bsam //
T02D2927:330b-16: sbyin pa gnyis rdzogs tshigs bcad brjod //
T02D2927:330b-17: dbang po rdo rje 'chang sogs kyis //
T02D2927:330b-18: phyogs skyong dag la bstod pa bya //
T02D2927:330b-19: bgegs la bka' bsgo lha mo la //
T02D2927:330b-20: bkra shis gsol gdab kun la yang //
T02D2927:330b-21: zhi ba la sogs gang 'dod zhu //
T02D2927:330b-22: mchod pas mchod de se gol sgra //
T02D2927:330b-23: yi ge brgya pa mu: bcas pas //
T02D2927:330b-24: bzod gsol rang gnas gshegs su gsol //
T02D2927:330b-25: gtor ma thag ring gnas bcas bzhag / dri ma ma yal 'byung po mnyes //
T02D2927:330b-26: de bas khyi bya dag la min//
T02D2927:330b-28: rang gi las zhes gsungs pas na //
T02D2927:330b-29: 'bad de sgrub pa kun zhugs pa'i //
T02D2927:330b-30: rnal 'byor ba yis gus byas na //
T02D2927:330b-31: dngos grub rnam gnyis grogs su 'gyur //
T02D2927:330b-32: sangs rgyas gsang ba bdag gis ni //
T02D2927:330b-33: 'jam dpal go chas gsol btab nas //
T02D2927:330b-34: gtor ma'i rim pa bsdus pa yis //
T02D2927:330b-35: dge bas kun kyang grol bar shog /'phags pa rdo
T02D2927:330b-36: rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi
T02D2927:330b-37: gtor ma'i cho ga'i rim pa slob dpon chen po
T02D2927:330b-38: sangs rgyas gsang bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2927:330b-40: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /
